Articles.Content:
Welcome guys! I would like to make own Kerbal Space Program mod, that would add some basic parts ( engines, tanks etc. )

How do I start with this all? Thanks for all help

As I've figured out how to make various parts I've tried to document the steps and note any gotchas I came across here. I've been using Blender and Gimp - both free. You'll also need Unity(free if you have under X dollars of income from the Unity games you develop) and PartTools.

Do be careful though - you may find the only time you spend in game is testing the shinny new parts you've made.

Happy modding!

Edit: forgot to mention Unity version for 1.8.X and 1.9.X is 2019.2.2f1 - not so important for parts but very important if you're making plugins

Edited June 7, 2020 by wasml
Unity version
